submission:
from collections import defaultdict
class Solution(object):
    def countSubarrays(self, nums, k):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type k: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        p = 0
        b = k
        while b > 1:
            b /= 2
            p += 1
        b = 2 ** p
        res = 0
        d = {}
        for i in nums:
            new_d = {}
            for a in d:
                if (a&i&k - k) % b == 0:
                    new_d[a&i] = new_d.get(a&i, 0) + d[a]
            new_d[i] = new_d.get(i, 0) + 1
            # print(new_d)
            res += new_d.get(k, 0)
            # print(res)
            d = new_d
        # res += new_d.get(k, 0)
        return res
